lesson.title: Oh Holy Night - A Reason for Hope
lesson.author: Lessons.church

items.content: Begin by sharing your favorite Christmas carol with the group.
Reflect on why these songs hold significance during the holiday season.
Long lay the world in sin and error pining, till He appeared and the soul felt its worth.
Discuss what it means to "pine" or yearn for hope in a broken world.
Reflect on the angel's message to Joseph: Why is Jesus called "God saves"?
